author: nishant0
content:
I was under the impression that we did have to update our attestation bitfield
for whichever particular committees we subscribed to

author: nishant0
content:
Realised I may not be fully correct:
Spec: 
```
Maintain advertisement of the randomly selected subnets in their node's ENR attnets entry by setting the randomly selected subnet_id bits to True (e.g. ENR["attnets"][subnet_id] = True) for all persistent attestation subnets
```
It doesn't specifically say anything about aggregators subscribing to particular subnets and updating their ENR

author: jonny.derp
content:
I hear ya.  I talked to <@!291925846556540928> about possibly clarifying this in the spec and he was considering adding a note.  Something like:

"Note: Short lived beacon committee assignments should not translate into updating attnets field in the ENR"

author: nishant0
content: Yeah that would be useful to clarify, also what would be nice would be to clarify the role of metadata. If you read the spec, it isn't immediately obvious that metadata is meant to encapsulate the subnet bitfield from an enr
